resources.string: Paneer 65 is a popular Indian vegetarian dish made by marinating cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) in a flavorful blend of spices, herbs, and yogurt. The marinated paneer is then deep-fried until crispy and served as a spicy and tangy appetizer or snack.
Tandoori chicken is a popular Indian dish characterized by marinated chicken pieces cooked in a traditional clay oven called a tandoor. It is known for its vibrant red color and smoky flavor
Butter chicken is a popular Indian dish consisting of tender chicken cooked in a rich, creamy tomato sauce.
Chole Bhatura is a popular North Indian dish consisting of deep-fried, fluffy bread called Bhatura, served with spicy and tangy chickpea curry known as Chole.
Paav Bhaji is a popular Indian street food dish consisting of mashed vegetables cooked with a blend of spices, served with buttered bread rolls.

Palak paneer is a popular Indian vegetarian dish where cubes of soft cottage cheese are cooked in a flavorful, creamy spinach gravy, infused with aromatic spices, resulting in a delightful and nutritious combination of flavors.
Gulab Jamun is a popular Indian dessert made from a dough of milk solids and flour, deep-fried until golden brown.
Jalebi is a popular Indian sweet made by deep-frying a fermented batter in a pretzel or circular shape, which is then soaked in a sugary syrup.
